data.title: Quassinoids: Anticancer and Antimalarial Activities
data.meta_description: Quassinoids were initially isolated as bitter principles of plants of the Simaroubaceae family. These natural products are formed by oxidative degradation of triterpene derivatives. Since the 1970s, these molecules have attracted attention because of their promising...
